name: Bodengo 2
description:
Bodengo II (Middle Bodengo) is a thrilling waterpark with fairly steady action from start to finish. Although it has been done without the use of ropes, the last drop, marked #1 on a metal placard next to the anchor, which has a traverse line set on the left to reach the anchor, is best rappelled. The other option is to downclimb and slide the lower portion but the slide has a nasty ledge at the bottom. The first anchor is a nice warm up jump about 30’. The second drop is a superb slide. The third drop (in the banner photo above) seems intimidating from the top, but is a nice slide into a 25’ drop into a soft aerated bowl. Some jumps are slightly technical in nature and require some downclimbing.
